cGELMesh Class Reference
[Module - GEL Dynamics Engine (Deformable Body Simulation)]

cGELMesh inherits from cMesh and integrate a skeleton model for deformation simulation. More...

#include <CGELMesh.h>

Detailed Description

cGELMesh inherits from cMesh and integrate a skeleton model for deformation simulation.

void cGELMesh::connectVerticesToSkeleton ( bool  a_connectToNodesOnly  ) 

Connect each vertex to skeleton.

Connect each vertex to nearest node.

Parameters:
a_connectToNodesOnly if true, then skin is only connected to nodes. otherwise skin shall be connected to links too.
